website_summaries.verdict: Outsunny’s inexpensive adjustable patio umbrella looks great, was designed to last, and its low price makes it easy to outfit a patio with multiple umbrellas.
pros: Easily disassembles into 2 pieces for efficient storage
cons: This model does not include a base to hold the umbrella in place

customer_reviews.title: It flies out of the umbrella stand often. It ...
customer_reviews.text: It flies out of the umbrella stand often. It does still let sunlight through. I have yet to figure out how to angle it without the wind making it fly and turn.
customer_reviews.author: Weili

customer_reviews.title: it feels a lot sturdier than I expected so I'm a happy camper. After two months of hot Southern California ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my condo's patio because of its size and ability to tilt. I already had a base (this does not come with one, in case you were wondering) and the price couldn't be beat. For its price, it feels a lot sturdier than I expected so I'm a happy camper. After two months of hot Southern California sun and fires, the material hasn't faded yet. This umbrella really is the best bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Young

customer_reviews.title: We love it umbrella
customer_reviews.text: We love it umbrella. It works great and is very sturdy. We've had several high wind days and it's held up well. Love the color too. The price can't be beat for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: They are all the same
customer_reviews.text: I would give it a five but I have not had it for long. I can say that from shopping around all umbrellas are made of similar quality wood metal or plastic. This is made of wood on the top and plastic at the bottom. It seems to be very strong and the fabric is well made. The fabric is the same as the ones I have seen in other umbrellas of this kind. I got this at a frivolously cheap rice compared to the big stores and if it breaks after my short summer I will not cry. I like it so far.
customer_reviews.author: shopaholicme

customer_reviews.title: Only good thing is that it is really light
customer_reviews.text: In less than a year the color faded. Only good thing is that it is really light... but that is also not good as it tends to go "flying around" with any small wind.
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: Great looking & good value
customer_reviews.text: This is a great patio umbrella, especially for the price. It looks good, is good quality. I left it out all winter, in a place where the winters are hard, and it is in perfect shape. I have had it for one summer and no fading so far.
customer_reviews.author: llpp

customer_reviews.title: Shadey
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is perfect for its function. The only drawback, if I had to print one, is that it does not have a velcro tie so that when closed it can be secured tight. I will have to get a bunjie cord.
customer_reviews.author: Mary D.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Nice umbrella and good color. A bit too easy for the wind to grab and ended up on the roof, but not damaged, amazingly. I plan on buying 1-2 more.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: A good product
customer_reviews.text: Love it, easy to use. Like all outdoor umbrellas, it fades by the end of the summer but the function is still 100% so no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Anne B

customer_reviews.title: fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is amazing, especially for the price. I've used it for 2 summers now and it works just as well as the day it was new. Can't tell the difference between the really expensive pottery barn one and this one.
customer_reviews.author: Debdzhair

customer_reviews.title: ? pay more???
customer_reviews.text: love it!! easy to wind up or down and fits perfectly in my patio table. The color is a wine red or darkish red and the water just drips off.
customer_reviews.author: Mcbenjy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good quality very well made love it glad I got it!! would buy it again!!
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR ANY TYPE OF WIND CONDITIONS
customer_reviews.text: I bought a very heavy cast iron base to hold this umbrella, and it has already blown away with a slight breeze, after tightly fastening it into the base. Flimsy and cheap!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy F.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased! Sets up well, cranks easily, sturdy. Quality, beautiful, functional.
customer_reviews.author: EJG

customer_reviews.title: Metal  Pole That Dents at base
customer_reviews.text: The umbrella is great but the pole is made from metal so every time I put it in the stand and tighten up the stand screw it dents the pole.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Meinke

customer_reviews.title: Overall not a bad umbrella. I do wish the pole was heavier ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall not a bad umbrella. I do wish the pole was heavier duty to keep it from moving too much in the wind.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: The material is very sturdy......I got , red.....made very well......
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great umbrella for the price. If I can keep it from blowing away! Make sure to anchor it!
customer_reviews.author: L. Ross

customer_reviews.title: Nice umbrella......
customer_reviews.text: Nice umbrella for the price. The fabric is a little thinner than I would like but it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: celtic piper

customer_reviews.title: umbrella
customer_reviews.text: This beautiful umbrella is very nice especially for the price.Lovely fabric and color. I recommend this to anyone to buy!
customer_reviews.author: LStitz

customer_reviews.title: The is a beautiful umbrella and a great price
customer_reviews.text: The is a beautiful umbrella and a great price! I have seen other umbrellas for the same quality that are triple the money. The color red is also a wine red which allows it to blend with many color schemes...love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: great product easy to open and operate and makes sitting ...
customer_reviews.text: great product easy to open and operate and makes sitting outdoors a pleasure
customer_reviews.author: kenschiff

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the value!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this umbrella for a few months now and it's standing up to time and the weather ... although it has only taken me through summer and the early part of fall. It's definitely large, it shades perfectly, it appears to be made well, is attractive and the price is unbeatable compared to similar umbrellas. I didn't give it 5 stars since I can't figure out how to use the tilt feature. I contacted the seller a while back but did not receive a response as yet. I would recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Jea

customer_reviews.title: Good for the low price
customer_reviews.text: Good for the low price. Will fade in sun though and after high wind, one of the metal arms broke.
customer_reviews.author: Matta

customer_reviews.title: The color was true to the photo. I was ...
customer_reviews.text: The color was true to the photo. I was handled weeks of rain and even a windy day flight across the yard without damage.
customer_reviews.author: Jamesley  Dasse/ Edwine Alphonse

customer_reviews.title: Already bent from the wind and i already tied it ...
customer_reviews.text: Already bent from the wind and i already tied it down with bungie cords bc the base is not heavy enough for it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. As advertised and you can't beat the price. For this price you could buy two!
customer_reviews.author: Petti M Cash

customer_reviews.title: It is great for the price
customer_reviews.text: It is great for the price. The handle was broken when it got here but other than that it is cute and is holding up well. I have no regrets!
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: I like that it looks nice and goes up and down easy. I do not like how hard mine is to tilt.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy J Shirk

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: We received this with a bent rod that holds the umbrella open. Unfortunately, we did not open it until after the return window so now we own a broken umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality tilt table umbrella for a reasonable price. We have had it in use for only a month, but so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Those who hope

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice product and terrific customer service. I would recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Cherry Rangle

customer_reviews.title: This umbrella is great!!
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is great!!! I love the color, shipping was also fast! I would definitely recommend this umbrella and purchase it again!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Value!
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price? It's my second purchase ,only complaint is that color fades!
customer_reviews.author: Heavenmygift

customer_reviews.title: Very nice umbrella for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice umbrella for the price! Opens easily and tilts good. I purchased a red one which is a very deep shade of red.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with the umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with the umbrella. Looks great and so far no problems in 4 weeks. Haven't had much sun yet to really use.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Decker

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella seems decently made for the price, but the color is not as pictured. It's actually maroon.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Huzjak

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: nice material lightweight just be aware it does not come with a stand.
customer_reviews.author: S McCord

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and price
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and ease of raising and lowering. I wish it had a tie to keep the umbrella tight together during storms.
customer_reviews.author: Delores Ziegler

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice umbrella. However it came with a bent rod on one of the supports.
customer_reviews.author: kenneth dole

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality for the price. Seems to protect against rain as well. Easy to assemble. Make sure to buy a base of at least 24 inches.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Light weigth but very well made!
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella was bought on clearance for a very nice price. It was worth the full asking price. The shape was nice and the crank to open and close was a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Anderson

customer_reviews.title: too light
customer_reviews.text: The pole is too light. Umbrella flew up and broke my glass table which I had for many years.
customer_reviews.author: MJ Lukas

product_meta.title: Outsunny Outdoor Aluminum Patio Market Umbrella with Tilt, 9-Feet, Wine Red
product_meta.description:
Everybody loves a sunny day, but sometimes you just need some shade. The Outsunny 9' Patio Umbrella is the perfect choice for having dinner outdoors, but without dealing with being blinded by the sun or risking getting burned from too much direct sunlight.

Not only does this umbrella protect you from the elements but it looks good, real good. With two different 45 degree tilt positions to make sure the setting sun isn't in your face. The umbrella features a two piece pole design to make take down and storage easy.

It's hard to go wrong with an Outsunny umbrella.

Specifications:
- Height: 93"
- Diameter: 105 1/2"
- Side Clearance: 79"
- Pole Diameter: 1 1/2"
- (2) 45 degree locking tilt positions

NOTE: Base shown in photo is for display purposes only and is NOT include with the umbrella
feature_bullets: The Outsunny 9' patio umbrella is the perfect choice for having dinner outdoors
With two different 45 degree tilt positions to make sure the setting sun isn't in your face
The umbrella features a two piece pole design to make take down and storage easy
Diameter: 106"; height: 94"; side clearance: 79"; pole diameter: 1 1/2"
Note: base shown in photo is for display purposes only and is not include with the umbrella
